author: dlr
msg: Incremental progress on localization, focusing svn_intl and
refactoring of client-side usage and DAV announcement to server.
(svn_intl_initialize): Changed return type from apr_status_t to
svn_error_t *, allowing for more informative error reporting.
preferences for the specified context, and defaults to the current

(SVN_CLIENT_MESSAGE_LOCALE): Moved in definition of constant from

part of the interface.  Added N_() macro acround its value.
(svn_intl_initialize): Changed return type from apr_status_t to

(NO_LOCALE_PREFS): Statically allocated constant returned when no
factored out of util.c:parsed_request.  Returns system locale based
on value from .po file, per suggestion from Peter Lunblad.

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix issue #2105: add "--no-ignore" switch to 'svn import' and 'svn add'.
(svn_client_import2): New function. Similar to svn_client_import() but
(add): Take new boolean parameter 'no_ignore' to function and
except for the additional boolean parameter 'no_ignore'.
(svn_config_ensure): Update template for user level 'config' file to
indicate that 'global-ignores' apply to 'import' and 'add' as well.
(svn_cl__cmd_table): New '--no-ignore' option for import and add.
